https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aV0XwZXvJVquRYK2Lvu1ujETqgp.jpg "Edward" is a narrative stop-motion animation. This story revolves around Edward's identification. He has lived alone in sewerage for a long time and collected objects that fall from a manhole. One day, a blind boy falls down the manhole and the situation drives Edward to a panic. Edward
